archimate:BusinessObject.name: ProdOfferPriceCondition
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Part of a PolicyStatement representing a single constraint that defines the assessment of the rule. The constraint is specified in terms of one or more ProductOffering, ProductSpecificationType, ProductOfferingPrice, and/or ProductOfferingPriceComponent. ProdOfferPriceRuleCondition is a type of PolicyCondition.
